title: Kiavetta Aluminum Gate Hinge | Wood Gate | Vinyl Gate | Heavy Duty | Self Closing Gate | Black Polymer | Gate Hardware | Instructions and Screws Included
features: Robust: Nylon Polymer Hinge Will Last for Many Years To Come. No Exposed Metal to Rust, Chip, or Fade
Convenience: Self Closing Hinge with Adjustable Tension. Allen Wrench Provided.
Safety: Self-Closing Hinges Are Approved for Pool Enclosures. Be Sure to Check Your Local Codes.
description: Larger nylon polymer hinges for gate applications. This robust self-closing hinge will last for many years as nylon polymer will not rust. The hinge can be used for aluminum gates, wood gates, and vinyl gates. An Allen wrench is included to adjust the tension of the self-closing mechanism. Provided are self-taping metal screws for aluminum or metal gate installation. If you are installing in a different application you may need to use different screws. Includes instructions .
